Accordion.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-accordion with modus-wc-collapse children. Accordion has single 'custom-class' prop. Each collapse item uses options object with title, description, icon. Place content in collapse's content slot.

ActionButton.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-button with variant='borderless'. Place icon as child: <modus-wc-button variant='borderless'><modus-wc-icon name='close'></modus-wc-icon></modus-wc-button>

property_mappings.icon: Place <modus-wc-icon> as child in default slot
property_mappings.title: aria-label

Alert.migration_notes: Uses modus-wc-alert with content and button slots. Type maps to variant. Icon rendered via Icon component. Button rendered via Button component in button slot.

property_mappings.icon: Rendered via Icon component before content
property_mappings.title: alert-title prop

Button.migration_notes: Uses modus-wc-button with Icon component for icons. Type maps to variant (solid->filled, hollow->borderless, outline->outlined). Size maps (small->sm, medium->md, large->lg). Inverse color uses borderless variant with custom CSS for white text.

property_mappings.icon: Rendered via Icon component as child
property_mappings.state: Added as CSS class (active/checked) - not native Modus

connect_properties.cardId: string, option: string, index: number): void

Cards.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-card with slots: header, title, subtitle, default (body), actions, footer. Properties: layout (vertical/horizontal), padding (normal/compact), bordered, background-figure.

Chips.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-chip with label prop. Has size (sm/md/lg), variant (filled/outline), shape (rectangle/circle). Can place icon/avatar in default slot. Events: chipClick, chipRemove.

ConfirmPopup.migration_notes: No direct equivalent. Use modus-wc-modal with custom footer buttons. Modal has show prop and slots for header, body, footer.

ConnectSnackbar.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-toast with position prop. Place modus-wc-alert as child: <modus-wc-toast delay='5000' position='top-end'><modus-wc-alert variant='success' alert-title='Message'>Text</modus-wc-alert></modus-wc-toast>

property_mappings.message.text: Place modus-wc-alert as child with alert-title
property_mappings.message.type: Use modus-wc-alert variant (success, error, warning, default)
property_mappings.message.buttonText: not available (toast has no built-in action button)

CustomCheckbox.migration_notes: Uses modus-wc-checkbox. checked prop maps to value. Events use synthetic event wrappers to match original signatures. Uses createSignal for internal checked state synced with prop.

property_mappings.name: name prop
property_mappings.value: Not used directly (checkbox value is boolean)
property_mappings.onInputRef: ref callback to expose internal input

CustomDatePicker.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-date (not date-picker). Has format prop for date display format, min/max for date range, weekStartDay. Events: inputChange, calendarMonthChange, calendarYearChange.

CustomError.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-alert with variant='error'. Place error text as child content.

property_mappings.error: Use as text content in default slot

CustomInput.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-text-input. Has feedback prop for errors (feedback.level='error', feedback.message). Events: inputChange, inputBlur, inputFocus. Size values: sm/md/lg. Type prop for input type.

CustomSelect.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-select with options array. Options format: {label: string, value: string, disabled?: boolean}. Has feedback prop for errors. Events: inputChange, inputBlur, inputFocus.

CustomTextarea.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-textarea. Has feedback prop for errors. Props: readonly, maxLength, minLength, rows. Events: inputChange, inputBlur, inputFocus. Size: sm/md/lg.

property_mappings.children: Place in default slot (element to attach tooltip to)

CustomTooltip.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-tooltip with content prop. Position: auto/top/right/bottom/left. Wrap element in tooltip: <modus-wc-tooltip content='text' position='top'><element>Hover me</element></modus-wc-tooltip>. Can disable with disabled prop.

property_mappings.title: Place in header slot
property_mappings.waiting: Set disabled on buttons while waiting

DeleteConfirmationModal.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-modal with slots. Place title in header slot, message in content slot, buttons in footer slot. Control visibility with showModal()/close() methods on modal element using modal-id.

property_mappings.customAnchorIcon: Place custom icon in button slot

DropDownMenu.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-dropdown-menu with button and menu slots. Button props: button-color, button-size, button-variant. Menu props: menu-placement, menu-visible, menu-size. Place modus-wc-menu-item components in menu slot.

property_mappings.iconPosition: Use start-icon slot or default slot positioning

DropdownOptions.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-menu-item (individual menu option). Has label, value, disabled, selected, start-icon props. Can place icon in start-icon slot. Used inside modus-wc-menu or modus-wc-dropdown-menu's menu slot.

Empty.migration_notes: No Modus equivalent. Custom empty state component using native HTML with migrated Icon component (modus-wc-icon). Centered layout with gray background. Icon displayed with opacity 0.3.

property_mappings.title: Rendered in <h3 class='text-muted'>
property_mappings.icon: Passed to Icon component with size='icon-xlarge'

FabButton.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-button with variant='filled', shape='circle'. Add custom CSS: position:fixed; bottom:16px; right:16px; z-index:1000;

property_mappings.icon: Place <modus-wc-icon> as child in default slot

Icon.migration_notes: Uses modus-wc-icon with Switch/Match for different icon types. For tc-icon-* (Connect icons), uses custom-class with icon-font class and empty name. For svg-* icons, renders inline SVG. For Modus icons, uses name prop directly.

property_mappings.icon: name prop (Modus icons) OR custom-class='icon-font {icon}' with name='' (Connect icons)

Icon.actual_migration_pattern:
<Switch fallback={<modus-wc-icon name={props.icon} size={toModusSize(props.size)} />}>
  <Match when={isTcIcon()}>
    <modus-wc-icon custom-class={`icon-font ${props.icon} ${props.class ?? ''}`} name="" size={toModusSize(props.size)} />
  </Match>
  <Match when={isSvgIcon()}>
    {getSvgIcon(props.icon, props.size)}
  </Match>
</Switch>

IconButton.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-button with shape='circle' or 'square', variant='borderless' for icon-only appearance. Icon as child in default slot.

property_mappings.icon: Place <modus-wc-icon> as child in default slot
property_mappings.title: aria-label

Image.migration_notes: Use standard HTML tag. No Modus component needed. Error handling:

LimitVisibleItems.migration_notes: No Modus equivalent. Custom show/hide component using createSignal for state. Uses migrated Button component for toggle. Emits 'toggle' custom event for wrapper integration. Default limit is 5 items.

PanelLayout.migration_notes:
Use modus-wc-panel (NEW in latest Modus v2). This component uses slots for header, body, and footer. Props: custom-class, width, height, floating. Place title and actions in header slot, main content in body slot. Example:
Title and actions
Content

Popup.migration_notes: Uses modus-wc-modal with slots for header, content, footer. Modal visibility controlled via showModal()/close() methods on dialog element. Uses createEffect to sync show prop with dialog state. Footer buttons use migrated Button component.

property_mappings.show: Controls dialog via showModal()/close() in createEffect
property_mappings.name: Used to generate modal-id
property_mappings.heading: Rendered in header slot as <h2>
property_mappings.subHeading: Rendered in header slot as

ProgressBar.migration_notes: Uses modus-wc-progress with value prop. progressPercent string is parsed to number. inFooter wraps in <footer> element. content is rendered after the progress bar.

property_mappings.progressPercent: value (parsed from string like '45%' to number 45)
property_mappings.inFooter: Wraps content in <footer> element when true

ProgressWidget.migration_notes: No Modus equivalent. Custom implementation using native HTML elements with ProgressBar component for the progress indicator. Uses createSignal for collapse state management. Header has icon, title, and collapse toggle button. Footer contains ProgressBar when showProgress is true.
ProgressWidget.actual_migration_pattern: Custom div structure with header/section/footer, uses ProgressBar component

RestrictedAccessSplashScreen.migration_notes: No Modus equivalent. Custom splash screen layout using native HTML elements. Uses migrated Spinner component for loading state and migrated Button component for actions. Background image support via inline styles.

property_mappings.title: Rendered in <h1 class='heading'>
property_mappings.buttonType: Maps to Button color prop (primary->PRIMARY, upgrade->TERTIARY)

Rightpanel.migration_notes: Uses modus-wc-utility-panel with header, body, footer slots. Header can be custom JSX or auto-generated from title/button props. Footer buttons rendered as native buttons with click handlers.

property_mappings.header: Rendered in header slot (if provided, overrides auto-generated header)
property_mappings.topLeftButton: Icon button in header (icon class name)
property_mappings.onFooterButtonClick: Called for each footer button click
property_mappings.onLeftButtonClick: Called when left header button clicked
property_mappings.onPrimaryButtonClick: Called when primary header button clicked
property_mappings.onSecondaryButtonClick: Called when secondary header button clicked

Spinner.migration_notes: Uses modus-wc-loader with variant='spinner'. Message is displayed separately in a div since modus-wc-loader has no text prop. Wrapped in Show component for conditional rendering based on 'show' prop.

property_mappings.message: Rendered as separate <div class='text-meta mt-2'> after loader
property_mappings.class: Applied to wrapper div, not directly to modus-wc-loader

Spinner.actual_migration_example: {props.message}

SwitchButton.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-switch. Property 'checked' renamed to 'value'. Event 'switchClick' renamed to 'inputChange'. Size: sm/md/lg. Has indeterminate state.

property_mappings.content: Use slot='tab-{index}' for tab panel content

Tabs.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-tabs with tabs array (ITab[]). Each tab: {label, icon, iconPosition, disabled, slotName}. Props: active-tab-index, tab-style (boxed/bordered/lifted/none), size. Event: tabChange with {previousTab, newTab}.

TagEditor.migration_notes: No Modus equivalent. Complex custom implementation using modus-wc-chip for tags, modus-wc-loader for loading state, modus-wc-icon for search/close icons. Native input for text entry with autocomplete dropdown.

property_mappings.separator: Key codes that trigger tag creation
property_mappings.selectedTagList: Array of selected tags rendered as modus-wc-chip

property_mappings.name: for-id
property_mappings.label: label-text
property_mappings.children: Place input in default slot or use for-id to associate

WithLabel.migration_notes: Use modus-wc-input-label with label-text prop. Has for-id to associate with input, sub-label-text for helper text, required indicator, size (sm/md/lg).
